business.headline: Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Sensex, Nifty gain after opening lower in volatile trade; Wipro rises nearly 2%Stock market opening: While the Sensex opened 100 points lower, it was trading 64.27 points higher at 77,552.77 at around 9.26 am. The Nifty50 was trading 16.75 points higher at 23,503.60.

Top stocks to watch today: Tata Motors, Wipro, JB Chemicals, Infosys, Vedanta, UPLWhile positive cues are likely to support the two leading indices on Dalal Street, US tariff uncertainty looms large. Here are some of the key stocks that will be in focus today.

Stock market on March 27: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty today?Stock market prediction: Nifty and Sensex have gained nearly 2% in the past five sessions, but investors will now be watching to see if the market can recover from Wednesday's drop.

How can India cement its position in the global value chain?With global value chains (GVCs) driving over 70% of international trade, India's growth story hinges on its ability to integrate into and scale within these networks.

Tesla to enter Saudi Arabia as Elon Musk mends rift with kingdomAmerican EV giant Tesla announced its entry into the Saudi Arabian market after company CEO Elon Musk's relations with the Kingdom improved in recent months.

UPI outage hits several users across India, NPCI says issue resolvedThe National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) acknowledged the issue, stating that it was caused by intermittent technical difficulties, resulting in partial transaction failures.
Wall Street is drifting again after getting whipsawed for weeksThe New York Stock Exchange saw a steady opening on Wednesday with marginal drops for S&P 500 and the Nasdaq composite.

Cancer, diabetes drugs under government price control to get costlier: SourcesGovernment-controlled medicines, including that of cancer, diabetes, heart-related concerns and other antibiotics, are set to become more expensive by 1.7 per cent, government sources told India Today TV's sister publication, Business Today.

Stock market closing: Top gainers and losers on Sensex, NiftyBenchmark indices snapped their seven-day winning streak, as investors turned cautious ahead of the monthly expiry. The S&P BSE Sensex dropped 728.69 points to close at 77,288.50, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 181.80 points, ending the session at 23,486.85.

India may lower duties on Harley-Davidson bikes, bourbon whiskey: SourcesIndia may further reduce import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles, US wines, and bourbon whiskey as part of ongoing India-US trade talks, according to sources.

entertainment.headline: Ram Charan's next with Janhvi titled Peddi, makers share his gritty 1st look posterActor Ram Charan's first look from the upcoming film titled Peddi is out. The makers treated fans with the news on the actor's 40th birthday today.

Salman Khan on death threats: Life is now just home to shoot and backSalman Khan, who has received several death threats, said he believes in God and will live as long as destined. However, he finds heavy security challenging at times.

Snow White producer's son slams Rachel Zegler's political remarks: She hurt the filmSnow White producer Marc Platt's eldest son, Jonah Platt, slammed actor Rachel Zegler and blamed her for the film's poor box office performance.

Mohanlal watches first show of L2: Empuraan with fans, Prithviraj and son PranavMohanlal watched Empuraan's first show with fans, Pranav Mohanlal, and Prithviraj Sukumaran in Kochi. The film released on Thursday amid much fanfare.

Priyanka Chopra's New York photo dump is all about daughter's makeup artist skillsPriyanka Chopra shared pictures from her quick New York visit featuring her husband-singer, Nick Jonas, and daughter, Malti Marie. The photo dump highlighted the actor's cute moments with her daughter, which is sure to leave fans in awe.

Salman Khan on working with Pakistani artistes: Get permission, I'm readySalman Khan says he is open to working with Pakistani artistes if the government permits it. The actor addressed the topic while promoting Sikandar, which releases on March 30.

Javed Akhtar defends Mohanlal-Mammootty, slams petty people in Sabarimala puja rowJaved Akhtar appreciated Mohanlal and Mammootty's friendship in an X post. Recently, Mohanlal performing a puja for his friend Mammootty at the Sabarimala temple sparked controversy over faith.

Salman Khan reveals why he, SRK and Aamir Khan can never star in a film togetherSalman Khan, in an interaction ahead of Sikandar's release, said that Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan and himself can never star in a film together. He then explained the reason why it is not possible.

Marvel Studios confirms Avengers Doomsday cast as production beginsMarvel Studios has kicked off production for Avengers Doomsday, revealing an impressive lineup of returning and new cast members. The film is set to hit theatres in May 2026, promising a thrilling addition to the MCU.

Salman Khan's film with Atlee delayed due to budget constraintsSalman Khan's collaboration with Atlee has been postponed as the film's budget undergoes reassessment. The actor confirmed the delay during a recent press meet.

Lady Gaga's Mayhem Ball tour 2025: Dates, cities & ticket sales informationLady Gaga announces her Mayhem Ball tour, hitting North America, Europe, and the UK in 2025. The highly anticipated arena tour promises an intimate, theatrical experience, with tickets selling fast.

FKA Twigs cancels tour dates in US and Canada due to visa complicationsFKA Twigs cancels her US and Canada tour due to visa issues but plans to reschedule. Fans express support as her tour continues with scheduled performances in Mexico and major festivals.

Salman Khan confirms reunion with Sanjay Dutt for upcoming filmBollywood superstars Salman Khan and Sanjay Dutt are set to reunite on screen, as confirmed by Salman Khan during a recent group chat. The announcement has thrilled fans, though project details remain a mystery.

Bazooka trailer: Mammootty is a classy businessman as he tracks down serial killerThe trailer for Bazooka, featuring Malayalam icon Mammootty and Gautham Vasudev Menon, was released today, March 26. The film will release on April 10.
Adolescence star Owen Cooper to star with Margot Robbie in his nextAdolescence star Owen Cooper will reportedly be sharing screen space with Oscar-nominated Margot Robbie in his next project.

Chiranjeevi to play Shankar Vara Prasad in Anil Ravipudi's film, script lockedDirector Anil Ravipudi has confirmed that the script for his much-anticipated film with Megastar Chiranjeevi is finalised. The project is set for a grand launch soon, with a Sankranthi 2026 release planned.

Nick Frost in talks to play Hagrid in HBO's Harry Potter series: ReportNick Frost is reportedly in talks to join HBO's upcoming Harry Potter series as Rubeus Hagrid. The actor would join a cast featuring John Lithgow, Janet McTeer, and Paapa Essiedu.

Kill Dill OTT Release: When and where to watch Anushka Sen's romantic thrillerAnushka Sen is back with a mystery thriller, Kill Dill. The series is set to premiere on 28 March and will be available for free on Amazon MX Player.

Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey reveal tough moments filming 'The Last of Us Season 2'Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey struggled emotionally while filming The Last of Us Season 2. Newcomers Kaitlyn Dever, Isabela Merced, and Young Mazino join the cast as dark themes intensify the highly anticipated season.

general news.headline: PM writes to Bangladesh's Yunus on National Day, stresses 'mutual sensitivity'PM Modi extended National Day greetings to Bangladesh, reaffirming India's commitment to bilateral ties while stressing mutual sensitivity to concerns.

Political black comedy at darkest: MK Stalin on Yogi Adityanath's language jibeTamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin hit back at Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for criticising the DMK's stand on delimitation and language policy, calling the BJP's response hypocritical and dubbing it "political black comedy at its darkest."

BJP claims Delhi's SC/ST funds were underutilised despite huge allocation by AAPThe Delhi government, led by AAP from 2015 to 2025, consistently announced ambitious projects for SC/ST welfare in its budget. The highest allocation under this category was recorded in the financial year 2022-23.

Salman Khan on death threats: Life lately is home, shooting films, homeSalman Khan, who has received several death threats, said he believes in God and will live as long as destined. However, he finds heavy security challenging at times.

'Papa ki pari are you?' It can mess with real-life relationshipsThis Karen-like privileged behaviour is not born out of nothing. It begins as a child, and when it goes unchecked, it could turn someone 'sinister'.

After long wait, Kashmir to finally get rail link to rest of the country: SourcesPM Modi is set to flag off the first Vande Bharat train connecting Kashmir Valley on April 19. The train is initially likely to run between Katra and Srinagar/Baramula, with expansion planned for August 2025.

S****y war plans: Pentagon's defence after leaked Signal chat blunderAmerican magazine The Atlantic has released a series of purported messages that allegedly showed Pete Hegseth sharing classified information regarding the timing of US warplane launches and bomb deployments in Yemen.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Ghibli-style pictures trend on X, thanks to ChatGPT's image generation featureIf you open X (formerly Twitter) right now, you are sure to come across at least one post with a Ghibli-style image. If you have been wondering why that is, it's thanks to ChatGPT's new image generation feature that launched on Tuesday.

Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Javed Akhtar defends Mohanlal-Mammootty, slams petty people in Sabarimala puja rowJaved Akhtar appreciated Mohanlal and Mammootty's friendship in an X post. Recently, Mohanlal performing a puja for his friend Mammootty at the Sabarimala temple sparked controversy over faith.

Uber, Ola's new competitor. Government's 'Sahkar Taxi' that will benefit driversThe government's upcoming 'Sahkar Taxi' will empower drivers with direct profit without intermediaries taking a cut from their earnings.

Snow White producer's son slams Rachel Zegler's political remarks: She hurt the filmSnow White producer Marc Platt's eldest son, Jonah Platt, slammed actor Rachel Zegler and blamed her for the film's poor box office performance.

Ranya Rao case: Gold dealer who abetted smuggling, helped dispose of gold arrestedThe Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) arrested a key suspect in the Ranya Rao smuggling case for allegedly disposing of smuggled gold. They got custody of him for four days to probe the wider network.

Questions raised over safety of Cheetahs in Kuno, administration issues advisoryConcerns over cheetah safety in Kuno National Park have risen after villagers in Teliapura, Veerpur Tehsil, attacked a female cheetah, Jwala, and her four cubs for hunting a cow. Residents threw stones and chased them with sticks, sparking fears over their protection.

Trump announces 25% tariffs on foreign made cars: Going to be permanentThe auto tariffs are set to take effect on April 2, with collection beginning on April 3, Donald Trump said on Wednesday while speaking to reporters.

Salman Khan reveals why he, SRK and Aamir Khan can never star in a film togetherSalman Khan, in an interaction ahead of Sikandar's release, said that Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan and himself can never star in a film together. He then explained the reason why it is not possible.

Mumbai to get water metro like Kochi: How soon is the launch?A water transport system for Mumbai and suburbs remained on the drawing board for decades; now the Maharashtra government has fast-tracked the project

The Atlantic publishes US' Yemen attack plans leaked on 19-member Signal groupThe chats, detailed in Jeffrey Goldberg's article on The Atlantic, reveal internal discussions, including Vice President Vance debating the merits of an airstrike on Houthi targets in Yemen.

UP man gets wife married to her lover: I'll take care of our childrenA man in Uttar Pradesh's Sant Kabir Nagar district decided to marry off his wife to her lover after getting to know about their affair.

SRH vs LSG: Will SunRisers Hyderabad smash IPL's first 300 today?IPL 2025, SRH vs LSG: SunRisers Hyderabad are on the brink of making IPL history by becoming the first team to score 300 runs in an innings, following their explosive start to the 2025 season. With a power-packed batting line-up and a struggling Lucknow Super Giants bowling attack, all eyes are on Thursday's showdown in Hyderabad.

Turkish student detained in US, viral video shows masked men handcuffing herUS immigration officers in plain clothes and their faces covered with masks detained the student while she was on her way to a friend's house.

Poop and run: How Delhi Police thwarted serial burglars' stinky escape streakWhenever Deepak sensed trouble or feared getting caught, he would defecate on himself, creating an unbearable stench that forced people, including the police, to back off.

Can't file FIRs over illegal hoardings, Maharashtra government tells courtThe Maharashtra government told the Bombay High Court on Wednesday that it is unable to register FIRs against individuals for putting up illegal hoardings across the state, citing challenges in identifying those responsible.

Actor Vikram's wife admits she has a favourite, and it's not her husbandIn a light-hearted revelation, Tamil actor Vikram shared that his wife often compares his skills to actor Mohanlal's, always finding the latter superior. Vikram is gearing up for the release of his upcoming film Veera Dheera Sooran.

Movement restricted due to safety concerns: Salman Khan on death threatsSalman Khan has raised security concerns, stating he has restricted his movements due to numerous threats. He now only travels between his house and shooting locations. The actor expressed worry when media is not present around him. This comes in the wake of increased gangster threats to Bollywood, including a shooting incident outside Khan's Galaxy Apartments and the attack on his close friend Baba Siddiqui.

sports.headline: IPL 2025: Four uncapped stars who shone in first weekThe first week of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) has seen several young stars rise to the limelight with their marvellous performances. Here's a look at the top five uncapped players who managed to grab the attention of fans:

SRH vs LSG pitch, weather report: Hot temperatures, big scores expected?Hyderabad (SRH) vs Lucknow (LSG) Match Pitch Report, Weather forecast: SRH will welcome LSG to the high-scoring Rajiv Gandhi International stadium on Thursday, March 27. Will we see another big-scoring thriller in the IPL 2025 season?

KKR contained the RR batters well, never let them get ahead of the game: Moeen AliIPL 2025, RR vs KKR: In the post-match press conference, all-rounder Moeen Ali said that the Kolkata Knight Riders kept a check on the Rajasthan Royals in Guwahati, helping them win by eight wickets.

Riyan Parag will be an all-format player: RR spin bowling coachIPL 2025: Sairaj Bahutule, the Rajasthan Royals spin bowling coach, said that Riyan Parag has the potential to become a quality all-rounder and an all-format player in the near future.

Chakravarthy has improved so much in last 2, 3 years: Moeen AliIPL 2025: Moeen Ali and Varun Chakravarthy had combined figures of 8-0-40-4 as KKR beat RR by eight wickets on Wednesday to register their maiden win in the ongoing tournament.

Let Rishabh Pant open the batting: Sanjay Bangar's advice to LSGIPL 2025: Sanjay Bangar said that the Lucknow Super Giants should send their skipper Rishabh Pant to open the batting and give him the freedom to express himself with the bat.

Iga Swiatek stunned by Rafael Nadal Academy 19-year-old graduateMiami Open 2025: After beating Jelana Ostapenko and Madison Keys, 19-year-old wildcard from Philippines Alexandra Eala has beaten Iga Swiatek to book a berth in the semi-final of the tournament.

Quinton de Kock 2.0? South African star shows KKR can be spicy without SaltQuinton de Kock seems to have found a new lease of life in KKR, while doing one of the toughest jobs for the defending IPL champions. While replacing Phil Salt may not be possible, the experienced South African adds a different spicy flavour to the KKR side.

Virat Kohli mania in Chennai: RCB star signs autographs, trains for spin challengeIPL 2025, CSK vs RCB: Virat Kohli thrilled fans in Chennai by signing autographs after an intense training session ahead of RCB's clash against CSK. The star batter focused on countering CSK's spin threat, preparing for challenges from Noor Ahmad, R Ashwin, and Ravindra Jadeja.

SRH vs LSG: Will SunRisers Hyderabad smash IPL's first 300 today?IPL 2025, SRH vs LSG: SunRisers Hyderabad are on the brink of making IPL history by becoming the first team to score 300 runs in an innings, following their explosive start to the 2025 season. With a power-packed batting line-up and a struggling Lucknow Super Giants bowling attack, all eyes are on Thursday's showdown in Hyderabad.

Points Table, March 26: Kolkata Knight Riders climb standings after Guwahati winIPL Points Table Update, March 26: Kolkata Knight Riders jumped to the sixth spot after a good boost to their Net Run Rate following their 8-wicket win over Rajasthan Royals on Wednesday.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
